# Introduction
This is a demonstration of creating visualization using ggpolt2

## Starwars data analysis
Starwars glimpse
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
glimpse(starwars)
```

Starwars Plot
```{r}
ggplot(data = starwars, mapping = aes(x = height, y = mass)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Mass vs. height of Starwars characters",
       x = "Height (cm)", y = "Weight (kg)")
```
